name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Test Automation Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and testing frameworks. Proficient in a diverse tech stack including **Python**, **Playwright**, **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI**, **Docker**, **Podman**, and **Kubernetes**. Expertise in performance, API, and security testing, along with log collection leveraging **Elastic Stack**, **Splunk**, **ArcSight**, and **Microsoft Azure Sentinel**.
